mapper.select: select PI.ID_ as processInstanceId, PD.NAME_ as processName, PI.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, PI.START_TIME_ as startTime, INC.INCIDENT_STATE_ as incState, DP.name_ as component, pi.end_time_ as runState, (select TA.ACT_NAME_ from act_hi_actinst TA where EXE.ACT_ID_ = TA.ACT_ID_ and EXE.ID_ = TA.EXECUTION_ID_) as activity, (select TA.ASSIGNEE_ from act_hi_actinst TA where EXE.ACT_ID_ = TA.ACT_ID_ and EXE.ID_ = TA.EXECUTION_ID_) as assignee from act_hi_procinst PI inner join act_re_procdef PD on PI.proc_def_id_ = pd.id_ inner join act_re_deployment DP on DP.id_ = pd.deployment_id_ left outer join act_hi_incident INC on INC.proc_inst_id_ = pi.id_ and INC.end_time_ is null inner join act_hi_varinst VAR on PI.id_ = VAR.proc_inst_id_ left outer join ACT_RU_EXECUTION EXE ON (PI.ID_ = EXE.PROC_INST_ID_ and EXE.ACT_ID_ is not null) where (var.name_ = 'SCHUTZTITELNUMMER' and var.text_ = #{parameter.titleNumber}) or (var.name_ = 'GESUCHSNUMMER' and var.text_ = #{parameter.titleNumber}) order by pi.start_time_ desc
